comments: Tests covering the use of the array returning UDFs.

tests.name: basic struct creation
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (col1 VARCHAR, col2 ARRAY<VARCHAR>) WITH (kafka_topic='test', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM BIG_STRUCT AS SELECT STRUCT(F1 := COL1, F2 := COL2, F3 := SUBSTRING(col1, 2)) AS s FROM INPUT;

sources.name: BIG_STRUCT
sources.schema: ROWKEY STRING KEY, S STRUCT<F1 STRING, F2 ARRAY<STRING>, F3 STRING>

tests.name: nested struct creation
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (col1 VARCHAR) WITH (kafka_topic='test', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM BIG_STRUCT AS SELECT STRUCT(f1 := STRUCT(c1 := col1)) AS s FROM INPUT;

sources.name: BIG_STRUCT
sources.schema: ROWKEY STRING KEY, S STRUCT<F1 STRUCT<C1 STRING>>

tests.name: quoted identifiers
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (col1 VARCHAR) WITH (kafka_topic='test', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM BIG_STRUCT AS SELECT STRUCT(FOO := col1, `foo` := col1) AS s FROM INPUT;

sources.name: BIG_STRUCT
sources.schema: ROWKEY STRING KEY, S STRUCT<FOO VARCHAR, `foo` VARCHAR>

tests.name: empty struct creation
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (col1 VARCHAR) WITH (kafka_topic='test', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM BIG_STRUCT AS SELECT STRUCT() AS s FROM INPUT;

tests.name: duplicate fields
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (col1 VARCHAR) WITH (kafka_topic='test', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM BIG_STRUCT AS SELECT STRUCT(foo := col1, foo := col1) AS s FROM INPUT;

expectedException.message: Duplicate field names found in STRUCT
